insert into `email_logs` (`user_id`, `mail_sender`, `email_from`, `email_to`, `subject`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values (1, 'php', 'MagicPost trung1bmksnb@gmail.com', 'magicpost@gmail.com', 'Password Reset', '
This is a System Generated Email
Hello Super Admin (admin)
We have received a request to reset the password for your account on 12-12-2023 06:46:56 PM .
Requested From IP: 127.0.0.1 using Firefox on Windows 10 .


Your account recovery code is:   798551


If you do not wish to reset your password, please disregard this message. 
© 2023 MagicPost . All Rights Reserved.
', '2023-12-12 18:46:56', '2023-12-12 18:46:56')
